item.title: [DISTRELEC-3443] Payment modification IT
item.description:
Please modify the following attributes on the payment methode and confirmation pages of the ITA shop.

B2C
Payment Methods:

  • Change invoice to “Bonifico Bancario anticipato”
  • Credit Card stays the same

Add text on Payment method site:
Deutsche Bank
Cod. IBAN : IT59 X031 0420 2000 0000 0770 001
SWIFT BIC DEUTITM1115
oppure
Conto Corrente Postale n. 000024627200 intestato a Distrelec, Succursale di Daetwyler Svizzera SA.
Cod. IBAN: IT 77 A 076 0101 6000 0002 4627 200

B2B

Payment Methods:

  • Change invoice to “Rimessa diretta”
  • Remove credit cards

Add text on Payment method site:
ATTENZIONE
Sei un nuovo cliente?
Per la prima fornitura necessitiamo del pagamento anticipato, tramite uno dei seguenti mezzi:

Bonifico bancario presso Deutsche Bank
Cod. IBAN : IT59 X031 0420 2000 0000 0770 001
SWIFT BIC DEUTITM1115

Versamento tramite Conto Corrente Postale n. 000024627200 intestato a Distrelec, Succursale di Daetwyler Svizzera SA.
Cod. IBAN: IT 77 A 076 0101 6000 0002 4627 200

Se sei già un nostro cliente, non considerare questa comunicazione.

Order Confirmation:

For all the order confirmation (B2B and B2C), that the customer receive by email (text and PDF), the text to add is:

I nostri appoggi bancari sono:

Deutsche Bank
Cod. IBAN : IT59 X031 0420 2000 0000 0770 001
SWIFT BIC DEUTITM1115

Conto Corrente Postale n. 000024627200 intestato a Distrelec, Succursale di Daetwyler Svizzera SA.
Cod. IBAN: IT 77 A 076 0101 6000 0002 4627 200

 Add this text to the confirmation PDF footer before the “Richtpreis” text. Mark the Payment options with a * (e.g. Rimessa diretta*) and add the mark before the text in the footer (e.g. *I nostri appoggi banca…)
item.summary: Payment modification IT

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3000] Placeholder Text in all Input Fields
item.description:
Input from the backoffice team for CH or Elfa Roll out:
To avoid confusion please prefill the area phone number code into the phone form field on the customer registration.
item.summary: Placeholder Text in all Input Fields

comments.comment:
There are various options:
1) prefilling only "+41", as suggested
2) placing a grey info text in the field that disappears when the suer clicks in the field, containing an information about the format
3) placint an info icon next to the field with a tooltip

I suggest option 2), may also be useful e.g. for the captcha field.

Florian, do you agree?
Yes I agree.
Please estimate the FE effort for Roll Out 1.1.

Solution approach:
- Ability for Distrelec to maintain a placeholder test in each input field of the shop.
- Standard placeholder text behavior: the text will disappear when the user starts typing (exception: in IE8 and IE9 it will already disappear on focus)
- Placeholder remains in field if user leaves field without typing
- Placeholder text is grey
- Placeholder texts to be maintained in property file
- If a placeholder property for a given field contains an empty string, the field will contain no placeholder.
- Placeholder for password fields turn into ********* in IE8/IE9

Effort Estimation for Frontend:
1 developer day

Florian,
see above the spec and esitmate. Please advise on how to prioritize this task.
I agree

Task is in progress by Jan and Laurent
- a placeholder property will be created for each label property
- they will not fill in any text yet, just prepare the feature for future usage.

Instructions to Implement it for Laurent / Erik:

- Placeholder Texts go into the base.properties file and its respective language files (base_DE.properties and so on, you only have to put it into base.properties)
- For each single Label (Input field) there has to be a Placeholder equivalent
- Place the messages within the properties files close to the respective label message. E.g. for the register form there is a whole bunch of properties and the placeholder keys should be right beneath this "block"

I already added a placeholder text for the field company and the field password as an example within the register form b2b (File /distrelecB2Bstorefront/web/webroot/WEB-INF/terrific/modules/register/register-form-b2b.jsp)

Workflow:

1. Go to the form row within the jsp
2. Usually the form row has a <formUtil:formLabel /> and one of these <formUtil:formInputBox /> <formUtil:formPasswordBox />
3. look for the label key used for that form row E.g. <formUtil:formLabel idKey="register.company" labelKey="register.company" path="company" mandatory="true"/>
4. open base.properties and search for the label key
5. add a placeholder message close to that label key in base.properties. Try to use similiar key as used for the label. E.g. Label Key = register.company => Placeholder key => register.company.placeholder
6. Try to group all placeholder entries from a certain form within base.properties together after the label entries for that form
7. Add a placeHolderKey attribut at the formUtil element. E.g. <formUtil:formInputBox idKey="register.company" path="company" placeHolderKey="register.placeholder.company" inputCSS="validate-empty" mandatory="true"/>
   (This placeholder key will be replaced with its respective text within the formUtil tag)
8. For Testing purposes, you can add some text to the base.properties file entry. Now it should show up as a placeholder in the field.
9. After testing it successfully, remove the text from the placeholder entry in base.properties again and just leave it empty. E.g. register.placeholder.company =

Please list input fields which do not use the formUtil tag here so that we check these cases together.

Hi Jan,

I have added the attribut placeHolderKey for all formInputBox for the register, add address and edit address.
I have removed all messages after testing but it removed also the keys in the base.properties file. To add a place holder message, please use these keys :

-For the register part :
register.additionalAddress.placeholder
register.codiceFiscale.placeholder
register.company.placeholder
register.company2.placeholder
register.company3.placeholder
register.customerId.placeholder
register.email.placeholder
register.faxNumber.placeholder
register.firstName.placeholder
register.lastName.placeholder
register.mobileNumber.placeholder
register.phoneNumber.placeholder
register.poBox.placeholder
register.postalCode.placeholder
register.streetName.placeholder
register.streetNumber.placeholder
register.town.placeholder
register.vatId.placeholder

- For myAccount and checkout (add or edit address):
addressform.additionalAddress.placeholder
addressform.addressAdditional.placeholder
addressform.companyName.placeholder
addressform.companyName2.placeholder
addressform.companyName3.placeholder
addressform.contactPhone.placeholder
addressform.firstName.placeholder
addressform.lastName.placeholder
addressform.line1.placeholder
addressform.line2.placeholder
addressform.poBox.placeholder
addressform.postcode.placeholder
addressform.townCity.placeholder

Regards,

Laurent
Checked in 1.1 (CH/IT)

Hi Laurent,

You need to add placeholder for ALL Input Fields throughout the whole shop. So all input fields on all pages, lightboxes ect... And is there a specific reason that you took out the keys? Because the people that need to add them have no knowledge about the code and dont have this keys..so I would leave them in there, just empty..

Jan

Hi Jan,

If I add a key without value, the property is not added to the base.properties file.
How can I resolve this problem?

I will go through all components (InputBox, PasswordBox an TextArea) to add the placeHolder (I will use a names similar to the "labelKeyName" + ".placeholder")

Thank you,

Laurent

Hi Laurent,

How are you adding these keys? Usually my workflow is to just open the base.properties file and just add the new message property directly. That should be working. Then you should be able to leave the message property empty and it should be working. So e.g. myForm.labelname.placeholder = **Text would be here, but leave empty**

Otherwise maybe Raphi can support you if it is still not working.

Ok sounds good.
Jan

Hi,

I use the resource Bundle editor but our configuration remove all entry if there is no value.
Should I change it (Enträge mit leeren Werten behalten)? If yes, sould I set all values in comment to have the fallback on the en version?

Thank you

Hi,

Please DO NOT change the configuration, because then the fallback for not existing localized messages would not work anymore. Try to put all placeholder messages as a comment, please check, if the comment entries are not getting moved within the file when saving it in the ressource bundle editor, so that we can keep the logical arrangement of label keys and placeholder keys..otherwise you have to find a different solution.

Hi,

I have added all placeholder as you can see below.
To be able to add a property in the base.properties file I have add it with a white space (address.firstName.placeholder = \ )
I have imported an impex on the HP Q to add all properties in hybris with a empty value.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3421] No FAQ on Austria website, though in the CMS all looks fine
item.description:
Dear Pascal,

please take a look at the print screens.

please let me know
item.summary: No FAQ on Austria website, though in the CMS all looks fine

comments.comment:
same goes for Jobs page: http://www.distrelec.at/de/Jobs/cms/jobs

I checked the CMS all looks good.

The issue was:

For Jobs as well as FAQ, there were two pages with the exact same label. The label needs to be unique, otherwise there is no control over which of the two will be picked by the CMS when the URL is opened.

Jobs:
- Two pages: "Jobs" (with CMS content) and "Jobs Page" (currently empty)
- Both had the label "jobs"
- "Jobs Page" was displayed to the user
- Changed the label of "Jobs Page" to "jobs1" => problem solved

FAQ:
- same pattern as above

Are the pages "Jobs Page" and "FAQ Page" needed?? Otherwise I recommend to delete them to avoid this kind of confusion.

attachment.name: hybris CMS Cockpit - Windows Internet Explorer_2014-03-01_07-06-02.png
attachment.author: oilie

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3448] Breadcrumb entries in middle don't show in German only
item.description:
e.g. here:
http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Donnees%20et%20faits/cms/datenundfakten

the first term is in the set language (French), the last one as well. The two in-between are in German.
The translated terms are available, as can be seen in the path:

from
http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Qui%20sommes-nous/cms/ueber-uns
over
http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Entreprise/cms/unternehmen
to
http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Donnees%20et%20faits/cms/datenundfakten
item.summary: Breadcrumb entries in middle don't show in German only

Fields are ok but in the txt file I also gave text for the button. Is this button also translated?

Hi Jean-Wilfrid,

It's done, can you have a look please?

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3437] CC Payment issues
item.description:
I did the following:

  • Payment with CC Mastercard
  • Entered all data correctly
  • Entered WRONG CCV
  • 3D Secure showed up
  • Entered wrong key first then entered right key
    ==> DECLINED

Then tried again with everything correct

  • 3D Secure did not show up
    ==> DECLINED

Tried 2 more times with same result.
item.summary: CC Payment issues

comments.comment: removed ReqID

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3435] Wrong expression of currency in settings
item.description:
OS: Windows 7 Enterprise
Browser: IE 8.0.7601.17514
URL: http://www.distrelec.ch/

Go to the settings, country: Switzerland, language: German, the expression of the currency is wrong, instead of "Schweizerfranken" there should stand "Schweizer Franken". (img_520_pzu)
item.summary: Wrong expression of currency in settings

comments.comment: Indeed "Schweizer Franken" is the correct term.

adapted it in the HMC;
Adrian, please update the Impex
Label in impex file changed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3434] English Order Confirmation PDF has German Text
item.description: Order Confirmation PDF has German Text (at bottom of PDF)
item.summary: English Order Confirmation PDF has German Text

comments.comment:
DE:
Richtpreis: Preisänderungen auf Rechnung vorbehalten. Wir behalten uns vor, Aufträge von Neukunden und auch bestehenden Kunden gegen Nachnahme oder Vorauskasse auszuführen. Freundliche Grüsse Ihre Distrelec

IT:
Prezzi: I prezzi di vendita possono subire variazioni come previsto dalle nostre condizioni di vendita. Le condizioni di pagamento dovranno essere da noi confermati. Grazie per il Suo ordine

I nostri appoggi bancari sono:

Deutsche Bank
Cod. IBAN : IT59 X031 0420 2000 0000 0770 001
SWIFT BIC DEUTITM1115

Conto Corrente Postale n. 000024627200 intestato a Distrelec, Succursale di Daetwyler Svizzera SA.
Cod. IBAN: IT 77 A 076 0101 6000 0002 4627 200



EN:
Recommended price: Prices are subject to change. We reserve the right to demand cash on delivery or payment in advance for orders from new and existing customers. Thank you very much for your order.

FR:
Prix recommandé: sous réserve de modification de prix sur la facture. Nous nous réservons le droit d'effectuer envois aux des nouveaux clients ainsi que des clients existants contre remboursement ou paiement anticipé. Merci pour votre commande.
the correct texts after the products lists.

FR text has no sens. It does not mean the same as EN. Here after my translation to FR:

Prix à titre indicatif: les prix facturés sont sujet aux changements.
Nous nous réservons le droit de traiter les commandes contre paiement cash à la livraison ou en avance pour les nouveaux et/ou clients existants.

Cordialement,

Votre Distrelec
Fixed for CH fr & en, will be ready after the next deployment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3430] No e-mail received when share a search result
item.description:
OS: Windows 7 Enterprise
Browser: IE 8.0.7601.17514
URL: http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Aktive-Bauelemente/Analoge-Schaltungen/c/cat-L2-3D_525338?q=*&filter_Category3=Analoge+Schaltungen&filter_Buyable=1&filter_Price=1047+-+1562&filter_Versorgungsspannung=2.7%3F16+V

Go to url above, click on share via e-mail, fill out the appearing form, pop up tell us the e-mail was sent succesfully, but no e-mail will be received in inbox. (img_505-508_pzu)
item.summary: No e-mail received when share a search result

comments.comment: Just tried ... not reproducible (s. screenshot)

tried to share
http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Aktive-Bauelemente/Analoge-Schaltungen/c/cat-L2-3D_525338?q=*&filter_Category3=Analoge+Schaltungen&filter_Buyable=1&filter_Price=1047+-+1562&filter_Versorgungsspannung=2.7%3F16+V

and
http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Laborkabel-%C3%B8-4-mm-rot-100-cm-Multi-Contact-SML-100cm-red/p/14022002

Total of 4 times. No email did arrive.

The following usecases had a problem. Email were not set properly:
- reset password
- send product link to friend as anonymous user (was working as registered user)
- send search result to friend as anonymous user (was working as registered user)
- create subuser as b2b admin
- create an inquiry/quotation

I have tested all the above cases on my local developer machine. Please re-test after deployment von v1.1.3

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3422] Support page should not have a form; Only feedback page should have a form
item.description:
Support page needs to contain a text component with all out contact data, opeining hours, etc.

On test it is as well a form.....on prod it was correct. Not anymore.

Please allow only text on support:

http://www.distrelec.at/de/Support/cms/support
item.summary: Support page should not have a form; Only feedback page should have a form

comments.comment:
A new template sneaked back in with the last deployment.

Raphael Husi changec it back to content page with navigation template -> the form is now removed.

Dominic adapted the left-hand column to be regarded even if the navigation is empty.

Raphael,
please also adapt the impex files accordingly.
Impex adjusted. Disabled import of support page. The support page is based on a ContentPageWithNavigationTemplate instead of SupportPageTemplate.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3302] B2E Customer Cart Problem
item.description:
For B2E customer, if two persons connected with the same account, then they share the same cart.
In this case, the cart must not be stored in the database.
item.summary: B2E Customer Cart Problem

comments.comment: Status?

The problem is resolved if we remove the Cart registered for the B2E customer. I tested it by logging in with two different browsers at the same time, the products in the basket are not visible for the other session.

Not resolved yet. I logged in with the following
account: "distrelec.testing.b2e@gmail.com"
pw: "distrelec"

And got cart filled as in attached screenshot.
Ready for testing after the next deployment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2108] No activation mail for sub user was sent
item.description:
-Login as customer 17
-Go to user management
-add new user
-fill in all information (customer 17-1)
-set yearly budget to 500
-click save and close

-> no activation mail was sent but you will see the customer in the user management.
item.summary: No activation mail for sub user was sent

comments.comment: Customer 17 has one sub-user with the email address jwlb29@gmail.com - whose mail address is this?

Tried it just now with distrelec.testing+17-nmu@gmail.com.
It worked perfectly.
Resolving this ticket.
this was jean wilfried's mail address. Now it's working.

Not working on CH Testshop.

Admin user is: distrelec.testing+SchnappSchuss@gmail.com(distrelec)
sub users are: distrelec.testing+BillIgware@gmail.com(distrelec), distrelec.testing+KenStumich@gmail.com(distrelec),
distrelec.testing+LeeMette@gmail.com(distrelec)

for all of these no confirmation mail was sent...

Actually the mails have arrived.
Enter each of your email addresses in the search field within gmail and the mails will appear.
I archived all emails so that it is easier again to find the emails.
doesn't work anymore.
Before the status is changed to "cannot reproduce" please try min 20 times to register a new sub account because it happens not all the time.
see comment https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-3430?focusedCommentId=545154&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-545154
